reviews.review_msg: Very pleasant and knowledgeable guy.  Few too many repeated lame jokes, but overall decent and fair.  Just make sure you read the textbook definitions for the exam, not just his list.  Course is super-easy GPA-booster.

Lectures are really boring and long. His textbook is super thick and not that good either. He is okay if you try to get on his side and participate in tutorials, but the lecture material was really dry. His lecture notes are like minimum of 12 pages long of full text per week!
